## The White House

```{r, eval=FALSE}
library(leaflet)
my_map <- leaflet() %>% 
  addTiles()
my_map <- my_map %>%
  addMarkers(lat=38.897957, lng=-77.036560, 
             popup="The White House")
my_map
library(htmlwidgets)
saveWidget(my_map, file="my_map.html")
```
